Cooles spiel bin jetzt 90 hrs in und dank der guten build variety wird das spiel definitiv nicht langweilig... ich hab mir zwar 2 dlcs gekauft, einmal ghostface und silent hill aber trotzdem hat das spiel viel zu bieten.
Der grind ist aber real also du musst dein Leben investieren um dir nen Killer zu kaufen.
Игра заебись, если хотите сдохнуть от нервного передоза(: 11 ебаных токсиков из 10!

ПУК

imagine playing this sh*t game

jokes aside the game is unbalanced, full of highly unskilled and socially inexperienced players taking out their social, psychological and personal problems from one another. devs don't ever listen though they keep the game updated. updates are okay but the main problem is balancing and they never seem to achieve some level of balance and never seem to want to achieve that. servers are bad, the foundation of the game -it's code- is poorly coded and constructed. besides the balancing, probably the worst thing this game has is its community. among all the games i've played, dbd's community could very well go into top 3 worst communities i've seen all my life. devs don't do anything about it. they probably can not do anything. players of this game should probably see a psychologist, hell even a psychiatrist so they can get started on medications to fix their insecurities, egoistical issues and having no friends in their lives. best thing to do if you're a dbd player is to uninstall the game before it ''hooks''you to itself. literally some of the worst times of my lives is wasted in these 400 hrs that i've played. it had its moments i had fun sometimes as well but it's just not a good game overall.

Very good game play and mechanics 10/10 recommend

Не работает окошко реакций, спасибо так сказать за хорошие игры сурва ♡
Починить генератор? Неа. Вылечить человека? Снова нет. Попадаю чётко по маленькой полосочке реакции, хоть в тренировки, хоть в самой игре за сурва, тупо не считает за попадание. 
А как же любимое окошко, которое так же приходится держать не полностью открытым, потому что если экран игры будет на всю, то ты не сможешь нормально поиграть, ведь уже вся игра будет возить либо вылетать, а то и просто остановится, ничего не показывая? Если бы этого не было, то можно было бы и играть...

Super fun game where you need to work together as a team (when you play survivor) and work independently as a killer.It is amazing when you're playing with friends and even better when you get god there are custom game modes that you can play as well if there is more than 4 people in your group.There are multiple different perks which grant you different abilities and for killer each of them have different abilities my personal favorite is the feral frenzy for legion--.overall a fantastic game to play by yourself or with friends i would greatly recommend this game.
เกม300บัค3ล้าน แนะนำเกมดี

good game but very fun with friends playing by yoursef can be a bit boring after a while

Прекрасная игра, очень интересная!!!
恐怖游戏启蒙作，以前都只敢看的
Casual game, fun to play with friends.
le jeu est vraiment bien , tout est fait pour qu'on y reste longtemps sans trouver le temps long. Seul défaut : le prix pour l'entièrté des packs fait assez mal.

Man kann das Spiel absolut Frustresistenzen Spielern empfehlen, die nichts gegen Camper haben.
Die Entwickler packen die massiven Probleme in meinen Augen an den völlig falschen Stellen an. OP-Killer (z.B. Doctor) werden zu Tode gebufft, während andere völlig auf der Strecke bleiben. 
Dazu noch die unglaublich toxische Community, die kaum eine Gelegenheit auslässt zu Teabaggen oder sonstiges.

Ich hatte viele Stunden Spaß mit dem Spiel aber nach einiger Zeit merkt man doch schon, dass man für dynamisches spielen bestraft wird und man Mitspieler häufig "opfern" muss um Erfolg zu haben.

Ich empfehle jedenfalls sich das Spiel genau anzusehen und sich dann nen Kauf genau zu überlegen, sollte man sich mit dem oben genannten nicht arrangieren können.
Ахуенно только баланса нет
NO COMMENTS

the game is cool , matchmaking is kinda weird. When you play survivor you will most likely meet new players and die cause of the team but when you play killer you will mostly like meet esport champions ready to humiliate you. other than that cool game

The game is okay but the community is super toxic. Let me tell you about how bad is it:

•	This game barely has sportmanship. The majority of players is entitled and always try to win favor to their side by forcing opinions on others.
•	The playerbase rely heavily on survivors, a side on this game, so the devs purposesly favor them more than the killer side. Especially SWF and voice com. Any legit ideal that actually make sense goes against this will be shut down by the devs and the moderator like a dictator.
•	Lots of people constantly act like a troll to gain Steam Award, thus making the discussion forum always filled with trash.
•	When someone tries to expose those trolls, the moderator banned them. It's seem that this behavior is allowed and making the forum always fresh so they would protect those troll.
very good game, MYTHICAL IS TRASH LOAWLAWLAWRDWALDFWAFA

The game is great. Good way to pass the time alone or to play with your friends as a group activity. The scare aspect of it makes it much more exciting than other games I play. Graphics and controls are good, but it can be laggy if you don't have a heavy duty computer. Turning down the graphics to low or medium works well.

updating my review, MMR is a joke,  solo survivor is still a terrible experience, console players are just so bad.  Killer is ultra sweaty every day and 4 good survivors will absolutely beat up a killer.  Cheaters still run rampant due to outdated anti-cheat and reports do nothing.
